Detailed Description

The answer to an AliveRequestPacket.

Contains the wanted module type and the type of module that answers. The status is set to OK if the wanted type and the found type are the same.
After the general ReplyPacket-header the format is
PosSizeComment
REPLY_HEADER_SIZE 4 bytes Wanted module type
REPLY_HEADER_SIZE + 4 4 bytes Answering module type
